recommended_degree: Administrasi, Administrasi Logistik, Administrasi Perkantoran, Administrasi Publik, Administrasi Niaga (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Assist in sourcing suppliers and collecting price quotations.

Support in creating and processing Purchase Orders (PO).

Maintain and update supplier databases and purchasing records.

Communicate with vendors regarding product availability, delivery schedules, and pricing.

Help monitor delivery timelines and follow up on pending orders.

Assist in comparing product specifications, prices, and quality for supplier evaluation.

Support the purchasing team in administrative tasks, documentation, and filing.

Coordinate with internal departments to ensure purchasing needs are met.

Help review invoices, receipts, and ensure accuracy with PO and delivery notes.
